website_summaries.verdict: All in all, Under Armour has done a great job with the design of the Heatseeker. Light and heavy players will enjoy the comfort and low-to-the ground feel of the Under Armour Heatseeker. Wearers of any age will appreciate the comfortable fit of the shoe model. At $115, the shoe can withstand rough games for years, giving you more than your money’s worth.
pros: The EVA foam carrier of the Under Armour Heatseeker delights shoe owners with the comfort and court feel it provides
Many wearers are happy with the fit and flexibility of this shoe model from Under Armour
According to a handful of users, they enjoy the impact protection the Micro G provides at the heel
The versatility of the Under Armour Heatseeker is appreciated by bigger and heavier users
Most buyers agree that they did not go wrong with the Heatseeker’s herringbone traction pattern
They have not experienced any court slippage during play
Several leave comments that the widely spread grooves prevent dust and debris from clogging the outsole
cons: The lack of Micro G at the forefoot receives backlash from older wearers
They say they experience joint pains after playing

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great fit, great look.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has huge feet... Size 18 and although he struggles less than he ever did to get shoes or trainers that fit, he does find the width a problem but these are very good. They fit well, are comfortable, look good and were an amazing price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Astraea80

customer_reviews.title: Tight and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Great to find size 15 trainers in a fashionable style and really comfortable, once you've gone 15 rounds with the elastication However size 15 feet through the ultra tight elasticated hitop are not catered for at all and they are really difficult to get on, even a shoe horn isno good, took me AND my brother 15 mins to get my foot through the top and flat into the shoe
customer_reviews.author: CSI

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable with great quality support✔️✌️🤑👍
customer_reviews.text: They are Great Value and a good fit. Get your actual size. I love the Under Armour Brand. They Are Total Quality And Are A Touch Of Class ✔️👊🤩👍💯% I recommend these boots to you 💯% ✔️ Thank You Amazon 👍😃👍 Hip HopTM️👊🤩👍 Aka The DenggusTM️🎉👊😎👍🎉 AKA HerboTM️🌿👊😤👌🚬🔥 💨 💨 💨 #NE33 #TheDenggus
customer_reviews.author: HiP HOP

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers! Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Got these at a reduced price and I'm so happy I did. Really comfortable and look brilliant. I do have a narrow foot and they fit me just and no more. You might need to size up if you have wider feet. There's really not much give in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: great but get a size bigger then you would normally
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just for every day use and driving , just the job, light and fit well, im normally a 12, but know that under armour are like Adidas and come up smaller then sizes so got the 13 , glad I did fit a perfect 12.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them for basketball and they are just what he needed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift and the recipient loved them for comfort and style. I liked the reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Baggy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product! Love the comfort on them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just amazing, very high quality and the fit is awesome. I highly recommend them for any indoor sports.
customer_reviews.author: jadenac

customer_reviews.title: As good as they look!
customer_reviews.text: They're amazing!! Never screamed before seeing trainers for the 1st time! Saw a lot of ratings saying get the next size up. Im a 12.5 so I got a 13 and fit perfectly! Can't wait to start using them!
customer_reviews.author: Dunstan Dowling

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Probably you need a half size bigger for extreme comfort but all in all a good fit. I need a shoe horn yo get mine on but once on after a couple of hours beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As seen in picture
customer_reviews.text: MY 17 treat old teenager loves these. Wants another pair . Great quality and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Mahers

customer_reviews.title: First I would like to say thank you but I am a little ...
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say thank you but I am a little bit disappointed with it it because it did say black but when it can it was black and gray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well fitting at the heel of the shoe. The toes are very wide though. Very good quality and overall are very good
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought the quality of the trainer on the inside were poor as the ripped with the second time of putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Very tight
customer_reviews.text: Very tight putting on are these rejects from under armour. Really have to work to fet foot in.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: They arrived promptly and in very good condition.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and fit perfectly. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Florescu

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 11.5. Got these in a 12. Perfect. Not the easiest of shoes to get into but the struggle is absolutely worth it. Ultra comfortable in my opinion. I feel they are great value @£40
customer_reviews.author: Bodyguard

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. I got them for £40, very good price for basketball shoes. The fabric is nice. Obviously they are low ankle, thus, if you need more support, go for an other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Heat Seeker Basketball Shoes
feature_bullets: One-piece, specially woven knitted top for a lightweight, snug fit
Extended ankle collar for a snug fit
Seamless synthetic overlay protects against the toes pulling force and increases durability.
External heel counter for support and additional structure
